alert.note: Alert for Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 2:49PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will bring heavy rain and strong wind gusts to portions of southeastern Montgomery and northeastern Harris Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 245 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barrett. This storm was nearly stationary and has produced 1 to 2 inches of rain. HAZARD...Winds Gusts in excess of 30 mph. Heavy Rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could cause localized street flooding. Locations impacted include... Humble, Spring, Highlands, Kingwood, Barrett, Channelview, Crosby, Bush Intercontinental Airport, Atascocita, Lake Houston Dam, Lake Houston, Sheldon, East Little York / Homestead, East Houston, New Caney and Porter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Avoid flooded roadways when possible.
